title: Sophisticated Aromatherapy Crystal Locket Essential Oils Diffuser Neck
description: Enjoy moments of stress relief. Boost your mood with this Sophisticated Crystal Locket Aromatherapy Essential Oils Diffuser Necklace Set. Gift Box included.
cleaned_text: Sophisticated Aromatherapy Crystal Locket Essential Oils Diffuser Necklace set Regular price $59.99 Sale price $99.99 Unit price per - Escape for moments of relaxation and stress relief with this Sophisticated Aromatherapy Crystal Locket Essential Oils Diffuser Necklace set - Includes elegant Crystal locket necklace to place assorted colors of diffuser balls & 4 -10 ml organic essential oils of lavender, peppermint, tea tree and sweet orange. - Add 2 - 3 drops - Material: zinc alloy, gold or rhodium plated - Lengths: 32 in with 2 in extension - Elegant gift box Included IMPORTANT NOTE: Please spot test on a small area of skin if you choose to apply any essential oils to your skin. It is best to avoid use on those with sensitive skin and with Eczema. Do not apply essential oils to cracked skin or open wounds. Avoid use on Pregnant women, Child and Babies. Consult your Doctor first before using any essential oils to treat any medical conditions, illnesses or diseases!! The Sophisticated Aromatherapy Crystal Locket Essential Oils Diffuser Necklace set is the yin, to your yang. You've found what you're looking for.
